001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.chain.FluentService;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.chain.FluentServiceDecorator;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.decorators.DecoratorsFactory;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.log.LogQuest;
007import java.util.Collection;
008import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
009import org.springframework.context.annotation.Lazy;
010import org.springframework.context.annotation.Scope;
011import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
012
013/**
014 * Factory responsible for creating and managing test execution instances.
015 *
016 * <p>This class provides a mechanism to create and configure new {@code Quest} instances,
017 * registering the necessary test services and setting up the execution environment.
018 * It ensures that each test scenario has a properly initialized execution context.
019 *
020 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
021 */
022@Component
023@Lazy
024@Scope("prototype")
025public final class QuestFactory {
026
027   /**
028    * Factory responsible for creating and applying decorators to objects.
029    */
030   private DecoratorsFactory decoratorsFactory;
031
032   /**
033    * Collection of available {@code FluentService} instances to be registered in quests.
034    */
035   private final Collection<FluentService> fluentServices;
036
037   /**
038    * Constructs a new {@code QuestFactory} instance and initializes available fluent services.
039    *
040    * @param fluentServices The collection of fluent services to be used in quests.
041    */
042   @Autowired
043   public QuestFactory(Collection<FluentService> fluentServices) {
044      this.fluentServices = fluentServices;
045   }
046
047   @Autowired
048   public void setDecoratorsFactory(DecoratorsFactory decoratorsFactory) {
049      this.decoratorsFactory = decoratorsFactory;
050   }
051
052   /**
053    * Creates a new {@code Quest} instance and sets up the test execution context.
054    *
055    * <p>A new {@code Quest} is instantiated, registered with the required services, and assigned
056    * to the {@code QuestHolder} for retrieval in the test lifecycle.
057    *
058    * @return The newly created {@code Quest} instance.
059    */
060   public Quest createQuest() {
061      Quest quest = new Quest();
062      registerServices(quest);
063      QuestHolder.set(new SuperQuest(quest));
064      return quest;
065   }
066
067   /**
068    * Registers the available test services into the provided {@code Quest} instance.
069    *
070    * <p>Each service is decorated, linked to the quest execution context, and initialized
071    * before being registered into the quest's service mapping.
072    *
073    * @param quest The quest instance where services will be registered.
074    */
075   private void registerServices(final Quest quest) {
076      for (FluentService provider : fluentServices) {
077         FluentServiceDecorator fluentServiceDecorator =
078               decoratorsFactory.decorate(provider, FluentServiceDecorator.class);
079         fluentServiceDecorator.setQuest(decoratorsFactory.decorate(quest, SuperQuest.class));
080         fluentServiceDecorator.postQuestSetupInitialization();
081         quest.registerRing(provider.getClass(), provider);
082         LogQuest.extended("Service: '{}' has been registered for the quest",
083               fluentServiceDecorator.getClass().getName());
084      }
085   }
086
087}
